title: Knife, 1985-103-270-b, ca. 1760
inscribed: On silver mount engraved: M. RENNER
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Blade has straight upper edge, lower edge tapering towards the point. Pistol-shaped horn handle with engraved silver bolster, ferrule and sides. Three silver caps on front and back, diamond-shaped.
